{{Wired embedded system |brand=DongShanPi |model=Nezha |revision=STU SoM (V1.1) |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |price=32 |est_release_date=03/2022 |type=SoM, development board |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=USB (Type-C) Female |cpu1_brand=Allwinner |cpu1_model=D1 |cpu1_cspeed=1.0 GHz |fla1=256 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX35LF2GE4AD-Z41 |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=SK hynix |ram1_model=H5TQ4G63AFR-PBC |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0 (Type-C) |expansion_usb_num=1 |serial=yes,, console,, USB Female (Type-C),, (115200 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8211F |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=USB to High Speed Serial Port Chip;Nanjing Qinheng Micro;CH9102F;;1; |flags=Micro SD Card slot, HDMI 1.4 |stock_boot=U-Boot;2018.05;g24521d6; |stock_os=Linux;5.4.61;TinaLinux; }} {{TagLine|Dongshan Nezha STU}} :[https://dongshanpi.com/DongshanNezhaSTU/01-BoardIntroduction/ Product page]
===Links=== *[https://linux-sunxi.org/DongshanPi_Nezha_STU ''DongshanPi Nezha STU'' on '''Linux-SunXi''' wiki] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2022/03/25/dongshan-nezha-stu-devkit-features-allwinner-d1-risc-v-som-sbc/ ''Dongshan Nezha STU Devkit features Allwinner D1 RISC-V'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[https://linuxgizmos.com/allwinner-d1-risc-v-soc-shows-up-on-new-nezha-stu-dev-kit-and-devterm-handheld/ ''Allwinner D1 RISC-V SoC shows up on new Nezha STU dev kit'' on '''LinuxGizmos''']
===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Allwinner]] D1 @1.0GHz :Single-core ''XuanTie'' C906 ([https://occ.t-head.cn/vendor/cpu/index?id=3817197695983423488 RISC-V]) *Storage: 256MB Serial (NAND) Flash, :TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card slot *Memory: 512MB (DDR3) SDRAM *Network: 1x GbE LAN port *USB: 1x USB Type-C (OTG) port *Power Source: USB Female Type-C :or edge connector
==Images== <gallery> File:DongshanPi Nezha STU SoM Top.jpeg|SoM Top File:DongshanPi Nezha STU SoM Bottom.jpeg|Som Bottom </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
